ygData.subject: Re: Thank you Aarkon.
ygData.msgSnippet: Amen see my other post on where to hunt safely. ... From: Jerry Luttrell  To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Amen see my other post on where to hunt safely.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 11:25 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Thank you Aarkon.


>From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
>
>There are 4 sisters that will be a problem... The one on the dock, Antimine
>(next to the dock, fishing), and the 2 ones in the huts... The other
problem
>is the other sisters fun to them for help if you don't kill them fast
>enough... So make sure darkness sticks...
>
>
>>From: "Jon Fiedler" <fiedler@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>>Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Thank you Aarkon.
>>Date: Mon, 2 Aug 1999 10:00:45 -0400
>>
>>From: "Jon Fiedler" <fiedler@...>
>>
>>I have a couple questions about the island... I'm almost 12 (on a new
>>server) and was thinking about checking it out.
>>
>>I know there are some high level sisters (red to my old char at 17)... do
>>you have to worry about them wandering by? The one I know I saw was
>>standing out in the water a little ways from the island.
>>
>>Where is a good place to hunt on the island? I've never really been there
>>(seen it from the boat many times) and since I believe they will be agro
to
>>my DE Necro (they are wood elves) I won't be able to really explore.
>>
>>Any other general advise/tips about the island?
>>
>>The darkness be with you,
>>Azerin now of Brell
>>
>>-----Original Message-----
>> > Aarkon,
>> > I read your post the other day about being able to
>> > handle Sister Isle from level 12+. Being level 12
>> > myself I decided to try it last night. I'm now
>> > level 13 and having a blast. Thank you.
>> >
>> > -Haytred
>> >
>>
>>
